About.Hours & facilities:
Open during school term by appointment only. Not open during school holidays.
General reference assistance available. Copying service for items to A4 size.

About.Access:
Open to researchers with a bona fide interest in the college and to members of the school community.
One week advance notice is required before visiting the Archive. Requests for access to restricted material may be made through the Archivist to the Principal.

About.Acquisition focus: The Penrhos archive acquires significant documentation created by the school body and its affiliates as well as photos, costumes, trophies, memorabilia and private papers relating to the College, its staff and students.

About.Major holdings: Saga yearbooks, 1961- Minutes of council and sub committees, 1969-
